title: Strengthening Artificial Intelligence Practical Competencies: Collaborative Creative Learning for Building a Digital Fabrication Safety Culture

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify three or more risk factors that may occur in digital fabrication environments.
Learners can propose one practical measure for spreading a safety culture through collaborative creative activities.
Learners perform safety procedures and risk response methods in simulation/VR environments with over 80% accuracy.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
